alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 27 at 8:29PM CDT until August 27 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR WESTERN UNION...ADAMS...NORTHWESTERN RINGGOLD...EASTERN TAYLOR AND SOUTH CENTRAL ADAIR COUNTIES... At 829 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Icaria to near Lenox to 7 miles north of Athelstan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Prescott, Kent, Cromwell, Creston Municipal Airport, Creston, Green Valley Lake, Diagonal and Green Valley Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
